snippet: The Hollywood studio, producers of “Shrek,” “Kung Fu Panda” and other hits, said that attractions based on its properties would be part of the New Jersey project.
abstract: Hollywood studio Dreamworks Animation strikes deal with developer Triple Five to bring Shrek, Kung Fu Panda and other animated characters to planned indoor amusement park in New Jersey Meadowlands.
lead_paragraph: The Hollywood studio, producers of “Shrek,” “Kung Fu Panda” and other hits, said that attractions based on its properties would be part of the New Jersey project.

headline.seo: DreamWorks Announces Plans for Meadowlands Amusement Park
headline.main: DreamWorks Animation Announces Plans for Meadowlands Amusement Park
headline.print_headline: DreamWorks Animation Announces Plans for Meadowlands Amusement Park
